data.name: World of Warships — Tachibana Lima Pack
data.detailed_description:
The stealthy Tachibana Lima is a well-rounded ship that can fend for herself in a gunnery duel and does not hesitate to punch above her weight using her effective torpedoes.

Key features:

  • Low detectability
  • Rapid torpedo tube reload.

This package includes:

  • Tachibana Lima, Japanese Tier II destroyer
  • Steam commemorative flag
  • Port slot

If you already have this ship in your Port, you will not receive any compensation for her.

You will be able to use this DLC only if you play from the game account created on Steam.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Czech, Japanese*, Polish*, Russian*, Thai, Turkish, Spanish - Spain, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Traditional Chinese*, Italian*, Simplified Chinese*, Ukrainian, Dutch*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.66 GHz, Core i3 2.5 GHz, AMD Athlon II X2 2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 440/630, AMD Radeon HD 7660
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 43 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10.1
  • Additional Notes: 1280×720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 x64 SP1 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.4 GHz, AMD FX 6350 3.9 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660, AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 45 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11
  • Additional Notes: 1920×1080
